articles.title: How Chirag Shetty and Satwiksairaj Rankireddy mastered defense-to-offense transition to win gold at Asiad - The Indian Express
articles.description: They both played un-Indian badminton, be it in attack or defense, though cleverness might get defined as the 'Indian style' given these two are writing the first draft of doubles success.
